statements: SELECT collection_id, collection_name, designer_name, description, release_date, price FROM SustainableFashionCollection WHERE designer_name = 'Emily Smith';
SELECT collection_name, designer_name, price FROM SustainableFashionCollection WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainableFashionCollection WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' AND release_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT collection_name, price FROM SustainableFashionCollection WHERE collection_name LIKE '%summer%' OR collection_name LIKE '%spring%' ;
SELECT designer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_collections FROM SustainableFashionCollection GROUP BY designer_name ORDER BY total_collections DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainableFashionCollection WHERE collection_id = 1;
SELECT collection_name, designer_name, release_date FROM SustainableFashionCollection WHERE designer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT collection_id, collection_name, price FROM SustainableFashionCollection WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SustainableFashionCollection ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT designer_name, description FROM SustainableFashionCollection WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fashion_collections;
SELECT collection_name, collection_description, start_date FROM fashion_collections ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT collection_name, end_date FROM fashion_collections WHERE collection_name = 'Spring Collection';
SELECT * FROM fashion_products WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM fashion_products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_collections ORDER BY collection_name DESC;
SELECT collection_id, collection_name, start_date FROM fashion_collections WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM fashion_products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT collection_name, collection_description, start_date, end_date FROM fashion_collections WHERE collection_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM fashion_products WHERE product_description LIKE '%summer%';
SELECT * FROM fashion_collections;
SELECT collection_name, designer FROM fashion_collections ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN fashion_collections ON products.collection_id = fashion_collections.collection_id;
SELECT collection_name, designer FROM fashion_collections;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Shoes';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT collection_name, designer, release_date FROM fashion_collections WHERE designer = 'Chanel';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT brand_name, country FROM fashion_brands ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT collection_id, collection_title, release_date FROM fashion_collections WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM fashion_products WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, image_url FROM product_images;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT brand_name, country FROM fashion_brands WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT collection_title, release_date FROM fashion_collections WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM fashion_products JOIN fashion_collections ON fashion_products.collection_id = fashion_collections.collection_id WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, image_url FROM fashion_products JOIN product_images ON fashion_products.product_id = product_images.product_id WHERE image_url LIKE '%.jpg' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT id, name, headquarters FROM brand WHERE is_ecofriendly = true;
SELECT name, theme FROM collection WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, total_price FROM order ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT brand.name, collection.theme, product.name, product.price FROM brand JOIN collection ON brand.id = collection.brand_id JOIN product ON product.id = collection.id WHERE brand.is_ecofriendly = TRUE ORDER BY product.price ASC;

SELECT customer.name, customer.email, order.quantity, product.name FROM customer JOIN order ON customer.id = order.customer_id JOIN product ON product.id = order.product_id WHERE customer.address LIKE '%Avenue' ORDER BY order.quantity DESC;

SELECT brand.name, collection.name, product.price, order.quantity, order.total_price FROM brand JOIN collection ON brand.id = collection.brand_id JOIN product ON product.id = collection.id JOIN order ON product.id = order.product_id WHERE collection.theme = 'Summer' ORDER BY order.total_price ASC;

SELECT product.name, product.category, order.quantity, order.total_price, customer.name FROM product JOIN order ON product.id = order.product_id JOIN customer ON customer.id = order.customer_id WHERE order.quantity > 3 ORDER BY order.quantity DESC;
